page.name: changing-world
page.text: The Internet has become an indispensable way in which we communicate, work, entertain ourselves and share events.

page.name: whatis3g
page.text:
• Interactive
  • Engaging

page.name: cust-communicate
page.text: The mobile phone is no longer just a phone—it's a comprehensive communication tool.
1G/Voice

• Basic voice service
  • Analog Cellular
2G/Voice + Messaging

• Designed for voice
  • Digital Cellular
  • Better coverage, capacity
  • Can access 1G networks
3G/Mobile Broadband

• High-speed mobile data
  • Designed for voice + data
  • Web browsing, video, GPS, location-based services and social sharing.
  • Can access 2G, 1G networks
4G/Advanced Mobile Broadband

• True mobile broadband
  • Designed for data
  • Faster mobile experiences
  • Web browsing, video, GPS, location-based services and social sharing.
  • Can access 3G, 2G, 1G networks

page.name: one-device
page.text: A 3G smartphone can save money by taking the place of many individual devices.

page.name: daily-life
page.laserbeam:
How can a 3G smartphone
change daily life?

page.name: ways-to-use
page.text: Relax

• Stream radio stations from around the world.
  • Watch video, movies, TV shows
  • Play games
Socialize

• Stay connected with your friends through social networks
  • Discover new ideas, news and information
  • Express yourself with photos, videos and comments
Learn

• Access information about news, weather, stocks, sports, and any other interest
  • Educate yourself in your spare time
Shop

• Browse the Internet to pick a restaurant
  • Save time by getting instant information about products and services
  • Find a good deal or the best price to make a smart purchase decision
Plan and manage

• Prepare and organize for the day ahead
  • Access email, calendar, voice calls without being tied to your desk
  • Check the weather, get directions before heading out
Share

• Express yourself with photos and videos
  • Share inspirations with friends, even when they can’t be there in person

page.name: upgrade
page.laserbeam:
How to help your customer
upgrade to a 3G smartphone
page.text: Show them that it is easy to use
Letting them try the device will make them feel confident and ease their worries.
Show them the useful new experiences they will get
Show them helpful apps that will provide useful information and entertainment.
Show them how affordable they can be.
Show them how they can get a 3G smartphone for about the price of a basic phone.

page.name: sales-floor
page.text: A few ways to let them try the features

• Let them hold and try the device.
  • Map your location.
  • Test a text or email.
  • Show them how to navigate.
  • Take a photo.
  • Show them helpful apps.
  • Watch a video.

page.name: objections
page.text: 3G devices are too expensive.
Show them how there is a wide variety of 3G smartphones, and they can find one to fit their budget.
I like my 2G device.
With a 3G connection, you can still get 2G coverage in addition to 3G data capabilities.
My Wi-Fi connection is adequate.

3G is kind of like “Wi-Fi everywhere,” meaning it provides Internet access via the same radio towers that provide voice service to your mobile phone. 3G lets you have the freedom to go almost anywhere and still have a connection. (FYI: 4G is the same thing, just faster.)
